CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 11, 1964, pg. 15, reads: "'That They May Know Him' - The dual purpose of the annual yule pageant at Carrone Baptist Church is, 'That they may know Christ,' both as participants and as observers. The youthful thespians of the recent production, wearing Biblical costumes, left to right, are: Carmel Walker, Connie Barren, Marvin and Roscoe Beatty, Patricia Addison and James Barksdale. Mrs. Mary Goode is superintendent of the church school; the Rev. P. W. Phillips is pastor of the church."
TitMainTitle: Audience viewing Carmel Walker, Connie Barren, Marvin Beatty, Roscoe Beatty, Patricia Addison, and James Barksdale enacting nativity scene, in Carrone Baptist Church, Homewood
